record.name: Ultra M04 Half Helmet
record.description: For an open feel on the open road, consider the Ultra M04 Half Helmet. This design, like all half helmets, delivers minimal coverage and weight, but still passes tough DOT standards. Stay cool with the moisture-wicking liner and cut glare on a gorgeous sun-soaked day with the removable visor. Bold art inspired by classic tank colors and graphics gives this men's motorcycle half helmet icon style.
